actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend the existing duty free treatment with respect to articles provided by the Max Planck Institute for Radioastronomy to the Steward Observatory.

summary.text: Amends the Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 to extend indefinitely the existing duty-free treatment for articles provided by the Max Planck Institute for Radioastronomy, Germany, to the Steward Observatory, Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to extend the existing duty free treatment with respect to articles provided by the Max Planck Institute for Radioastronomy to the Steward Observatory.
